amendment.description: To make available funds to support democracy- building efforts for Cuba.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2018 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2018 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S13367-13368; text: CR S13368) To make available funds to support democracy- building efforts for Cuba.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2018 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2018 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Ensign.
